模块 com.example.BubbleBobble
程序包 com.example.BubbleBobble.Controller

类 DifficultySettingController

java.lang.Object
com.example.BubbleBobble.Controller.DifficultySettingController
public class DifficultySettingController extends Object
The class, DifficultyController, is the controller for DifficultyScreen, and is linked with DifficultySettingScreen.fxml The Difficulty screen contains the radio box to choose from three difficulties:
  1. "easy"/li>
  2. "medium"
  3. "hard"
The corresponding settings will be transferred to the interactable world
